patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -16,6 +16,6 @@
   </form>
 </mat-dialog-content>
 <mat-dialog-actions align="end">
   <button mat-button mat-dialog-close>No</button>
-  <button mat-raised-button color="primary" [disabled]="rescheduleForm.invalid" (click)="submit()">Yes</button>
+  <button mat-raised-button color="primary" [disabled]="cancelForm.invalid" (click)="submit()">Yes</button>
 </mat-dialog-actions>

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -12,8 +12,16 @@
     <mat-form-field appearance="outline" class="full-width" *ngIf="cancelForm.get('reason')?.value === 'other'">
       <mat-label>Any Other Reason</mat-label>
       <textarea matInput formControlName="otherReason" rows="2"></textarea>
     </mat-form-field>
+    <mat-form-field appearance="outline" class="full-width">
+      <mat-label>Refund Method</mat-label>
+      <mat-select formControlName="refundMethod" required>
+        <mat-option value="original">Original Payment Method</mat-option>
+        <mat-option value="voucher">Voucher</mat-option>
+        <mat-option value="bank">Bank Transfer</mat-option>
+      </mat-select>
+    </mat-form-field>
   </form>
 </mat-dialog-content>
 <mat-dialog-actions align="end">
   <button mat-button mat-dialog-close>No</button>

+

 <mat-dialog-actions align="end">
   <button mat-button mat-dialog-close>No</button>
-  <button mat-raised-button color="primary" [disabled]="cancelForm.invalid" (click)="submit()">Yes</button>
+  <button mat-raised-button color="primary" [disabled]="cancelForm.invalid" (click)="showpopup()">Yes</button>
 </mat-dialog-actions>
 
 <!-- Popup Content -->
 <div class="custom-popup" *ngIf="showPopup">
